TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationIDAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationIDAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationIDAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Specifies the application ID (as a GUID) for this assembly. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute> takes a GUID in its constructor. When registration occurs, the components in the assembly are installed in an application with the given ID.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute> type.

Docs.param: The GUID associated with the COM+ application.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying the GUID representing the application ID for the COM+ application.

Docs.summary: Gets the GUID of the COM+ application.
Docs.value: The GUID representing the COM+ application.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.ApplicationIDAttribute.Value%2A> is set by the constructor using the GUID passed in as a parameter.
